languages.text: {n}Люмены киберласераксов загораются кроваво-алым. Не успевают обреченные жалобно вскрикнуть, как звери с голодным рычанием бросаются на свое угощение.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Повисает тишина, в глубине которой таится... нечто. Собравшиеся переглядываются в неуверенности и страхе. Внезапно из ниоткуда возникают силуэты с кроваво-красными люменами глаз. Не успевают обреченные жалобно вскрикнуть, как ласераксы бросаются на свое угощение.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The cyber-laceraxes' lumens glow blood red. Before the condemned can even scream, the beasts pounce on their prey with hungry snarls.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Люмены киберласераксов загораются кроваво-алым. Не успевают обреченные жалобно вскрикнуть, как звери с голодным рычанием бросаются на свое угощение.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Silence falls over the square, and within that silence, something stirs. The people in the crowd exchange looks of uncertainty and fear. Suddenly, silhouettes appear out of nowhere, their blood-red lumens glowering murderously. Before the condemned can even scream, the laceraxes pounce on their prey.{/n}

{n}Silence falls over the square, and within that silence, something stirs. The people in the crowd exchange looks of uncertainty and fear. Suddenly, silhouettes appear out of nowhere, their blood-red lumens glowering murderously. Before the condemned can even scream, the laceraxes pounce on their prey.{/n}
{n}The cyber-laceraxes' lumens glow blood red. Before the condemned can even scream, the beasts pounce on their prey with hungry snarls.{/n}

{n}Silence falls over the square. From its depths, something begins to stir, as people exchange looks of uncertainty and fear. Suddenly, out of nowhere, silhouettes appear, the blood-red lumens of their eyes glowering. Before the condemned can even scream, the laceraxes pounce on their prey.{/n}
{n}The cyber-laceraxes' lumens glow blood red. Before the condemned can even scream, the beasts pounce on their prey with hungry snarls.{/n}
{n}The cyber-laceraxes' lumens glow blood red. Before the condemned can even scream, the beasts pounce on their prey with hungry snarls.{/n}
{n}The cyber-laceraxes' lumens glow blood red. Before the condemned can even scream, the beasts pounce on their prey with hungry snarls.{/n}

languages.text: {n}生化异虎眼睛上的流明灯闪烁着血红色的光芒。那些难逃一劫的人还没来得及尖叫，异虎就发出了饥肠辘辘的咆哮，扑向它们的猎物。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cyber-laceraxes' lumens glow blood red. Before the condemned can even scream, the beasts pounce on their prey with hungry snarls.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}生化异虎眼睛上的流明灯闪烁着血红色的光芒。那些难逃一劫的人还没来得及尖叫，异虎就发出了饥肠辘辘的咆哮，扑向它们的猎物。{/n}
{n}整个广场笼罩在一片寂静之中。黑暗深处有什么东西开始蠕动，所有人都交换着目光，充满了犹豫与恐惧。突然间，无数阴影仿佛凭空出现，眼眶里红色的流明灯充满杀意。那些难逃一劫的人甚至还没来得及尖叫，就沦为了一大群异虎的猎物。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los lumens de los ciberlacerax brillan de color rojo sangre. Antes de que los condenados puedan gritar, las bestias se abalanzan sobre sus presas con gruñidos hambrientos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cyber-laceraxes' lumens glow blood red. Before the condemned can even scream, the beasts pounce on their prey with hungry snarls.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los lumens de los ciberlacerax brillan de color rojo sangre. Antes de que los condenados puedan gritar, las bestias se abalanzan sobre sus presas con gruñidos hambrientos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Siber laseraksların lümenleri kan kırmızı renkte parlıyor. Yaratıklar, daha mahkûmlar çığlık bile atamadan aç homurtular eşliğinde avlarının üzerine atılıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cyber-laceraxes' lumens glow blood red. Before the condemned can even scream, the beasts pounce on their prey with hungry snarls.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Siber laseraksların lümenleri kan kırmızı renkte parlıyor. Yaratıklar, daha mahkûmlar çığlık bile atamadan aç homurtular eşliğinde avlarının üzerine atılıyor.{/n}

{n}Meydana bir sessizlik çöküyor. Derinliklerde bir şeyler hareketlenmeye başlıyor, insanların yüzünde belirsizlik ifadeleri ve korku dolu bakışlar beliriyor. Bir anda etrafta, gözleri kan kırmızı gibi parıldayan silüetler beliriyor. Mahkûmlar çığlık bile atamadan laserakslar, avlarının üzerine atılıyor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}サイバーラセラックスのルーメンは血のように赤く光っている。罪人が叫ぶ間もなく、獣たちは飢えた唸り声をあげて獲物に飛びかかった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cyber-laceraxes' lumens glow blood red. Before the condemned can even scream, the beasts pounce on their prey with hungry snarls.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}サイバーラセラックスのルーメンは血のように赤く光っている。罪人が叫ぶ間もなく、獣たちは飢えた唸り声をあげて獲物に飛びかかった。{/n}
{n}広場が静寂に包まれた。その奥底で何かが動き始め、人々は不安と恐怖の視線を交わす。突然、どこからともなくシルエットが現れ、血のように赤い瞳がぎらついた。死刑囚でさえ叫び出す前に、ラセラックスがその獲物に襲いかかる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les lumens des cyber-lacérax virent au rouge sang. Avant même que le condamné ne puisse émettre le moindre son, les créatures sautent sur leur proie en lâchant des grognements voraces.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cyber-laceraxes' lumens glow blood red. Before the condemned can even scream, the beasts pounce on their prey with hungry snarls.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les lumens des cyber-lacérax virent au rouge sang. Avant même que le condamné ne puisse émettre le moindre son, les créatures sautent sur leur proie en lâchant des grognements voraces.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Lumen der Cyber-Laceraxe leuchten blutrot. Bevor die Verurteilten auch nur schreien können, stürzen die Bestien sich mit hungrigem Knurren auf ihre Beute.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cyber-laceraxes' lumens glow blood red. Before the condemned can even scream, the beasts pounce on their prey with hungry snarls.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Lumen der Cyber-Laceraxe leuchten blutrot. Bevor die Verurteilten auch nur schreien können, stürzen die Bestien sich mit hungrigem Knurren auf ihre Beute.{/n}
